name: Slingin' Shepherds
description:
Just a demo, doesn't work with two players

Your goal is to kill all of your opponent's sheep while protecting your sheep from your opponent's bombs.

Your sheep are well behaved when you are around, allowing you to guide them away from your opponent's thrown bombs. 

You can also guide your sheep towards patches of grass where they will be able to eat and poop out bombs for you to use against your opponent.
